nhs_login_features.eligibility: Patients registered at GP practice in England or receiving NHS services in England

notes: NHS login is the primary authentication method for all NHS digital services
Over 46 million registered users as of 2025
Available to patients in England only
Single sign-on across multiple NHS and partner services
